question.ask: Questions 1~2  Your schoolmate is going to see a new film. He invites you to go with him. You ask him two questions about this.

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your class has a new comer from another school this term. You ask the new comer two questions.

std.value: What’s your name? Where are you from?
std.ai: What’s your name? Where are you from?

std.value: What do you think of our school? Are you happy with the new class here?
